info.name: Overclockers UK - Desaturated
info.description: Colourless, greyscale theme for the OcUK forums.  Easy on the eyes, covert browsing for the workplace ;)
info.additionalInfo:
You want to apply this style to "URLs on the domain" forums.overclockers.co.uk AND trust.overclockers.co.uk

I'd also suggest an ad-blocker for the top right image (as per screenshot).

If anyone spots any missed images or would like to request a change, email para@paradigital.net
